pokerapp

Class Hand

  • Object
    • Hand
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Iterable<Card>

    public class Hand
extends Object
implements Iterable<Card>
    Creates hands from cards and allows ranking, sorting, exchanging and printing of those hands
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    steve
